casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2002-2214. Greene v. Westfield Ins. Co.

Stark App. No. 2002CA00114. Discretionary appeal allowed; sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 2002-0579, Burkhart v. CNA Ins. Co., Stark App. No. 2001CA00265, 2002-Ohio-903; briefing schedule stayed.

Resnick and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., dissent. Cook, J., not participating.
